channel.title: Portfowarding
channel.description:
Hey guys i have a problem with port fowarding its been fixed before but i forgot how to re do it (had some other kid finally figure out the problem for me because it wasn't the simple way:( ) but, i have to setup a static ip on my linksys router along with the ipv4 static thing i forgot how to do it if any one could help thatd be great.
I have Team Viewer and Crossloop
Thanks!, -Nate
EDIT: heres a pic :D
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/294qla1.png[/img]

item.title: Portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @Mushy13 Mushy13
item.description:
@Mushy13 wrote:

trust me i think i do unless you have a solution cause before this static thing i had atleast 25+ people on teamview try to get the thing port fowarded. im not directly hooked up to the router or modem

Read full topic

item.title: Portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

You don’t need a static IP.

Read full topic
